original_text: Then Solomon supplied Hiram with 2,000 tons of wheat as food for the people in his palace. He also supplied 450,000 litres of olive oil. Solomon sent this every year to Hiram.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 히람에게 그의 궁정의 음식물로 밀 이만 고르와 맑은 기름 이십 고르를 주고 해마다 그와 같이 주었더라

sentences.original_text: as food for the people in his palace
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 궁에 있는 사람들을 위한 식량으로

sentences.original_text: He also supplied 450,000 litres of olive oil
Solomon sent this every year to Hiram
